mapper.sql: STAFF_ID, LOGIN_NAME, DEPARTMENT_ID, REAL_NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, SEX, TELEPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, LOCK_DATE, CITY_ID
mapper.select:
select
from sec_staff where 1 = 1 order by STAFF_ID desc
mapper.delete: delete from sec_staff where STAFF_ID = #{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sec_staff(STAFF_ID, LOGIN_NAME, DEPARTMENT_ID, REAL_NAME, PASSWORD, STATUS, SEX, TELEPHONE, MOBILE, EMAIL, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PASSWORD_EXPIRE_DATE, LOCK_DATE, CITY_ID ) values (#{staffId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{loginName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{realName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{passwordExpireDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lockDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cityId, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
